title: Hillary Clinton & Chelsea Clinton | Mark Meadows Complies with DOJ Subpoena; Brett Favre Scandal Texts Revealed: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at Mark Meadows complying with the Justice Department's subpoena, making him the highest-ranking Trump official so far to respond to a federal subpoena in the criminal investigation of the attempted coup on January 6.

Then, Hillary Clinton and Chelsea Clinton talk about how traveling has changed for them since leaving the White House, what it was like to go to clown school for their docuseries Gutsy and hanging out with Amber Ruffin.

Hillary Clinton and Chelsea Clinton also discuss how the overturning of Roe v. Wade might impact future elections, the major issues behind Trump's classified documents scandal and Chelsea's children's book, Welcome to the Big Kids Club.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
